price: 37. para que la sigan quienes quieran y avancen (por el camino de la verdad) o la rechacen.
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
